item.title: Building a balanced portfolio: How bonds provide stability and growth beyond stocks, fixed deposits

review.headline_rewrite: Building a balanced portfolio: How bonds provide stability and growth beyond stocks, fixed deposits
bullets: Even the FD interest rates are continuing to fluctuate due to the policy shifts taking place to combat inflation.
Incorporating bonds into the picture reduces risk by balancing equities, whose value tends to fluctuate with market swings and economic downturns.
Bonds, on the other hand, react differently to economic drivers such as inflation and interest rates, providing a lower correlation and higher risk tolerance
Investors should select bonds based on quality and proper professional guidance.
